summary:
The Security Council,

Reaffirming previous resolutions on Haiti, 
Expressing sympathy and solidarity to those affected by the 12 January earthquake,
Gratitude for the work of MINUSTAH staff and troops,

 Recognizing dire circumstances in Haiti, 
Welcoming Member States' efforts to support Haiti and MINUSTAH,

1. Endorses the Secretary-General's recommendation to increase MINUSTAH's force levels,
2. Decides MINUSTAH will consist of up to 8,940 troops and 3,711 police, reviewing levels as necessary,
3. Decides to remain seized of the matter.
